newsitem.title: UK: J.P. Morgan leads $427 mln asset-backed FRNs.
newsitem.headline: J.P. Morgan leads $427 mln asset-backed FRNs.

text.p: J.P. Morgan Securities said on Wednesday it was lead manager of a two-tranche asset-backed FRN totalling $427.125 million and launched in the name of Bombardier Receivables Master Trust 1.
